name: 2025 9th International Conference on Digital Signal Processing
content: Publication: All accepted papers from the ICDSP 2025, will be proposed to be published in the ICDSP 2025 Conference Proceedings by ACM (ISBN: 979-8-4007-1046-9). All papers will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and submitted to Ei Compendex and Scopus for index and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
organizers: Southwest Jiaotong University and Xihua University, China
